sentence: “American Leadership Action” was established to back the candidacy of Mehmet Oz, the TV doctor turned Republican running for Senate in Pennsylvania.
author: Ron Kampeas
title: AIPAC’s pro-democracy ‘super PAC’ does not mention Israel in its mission
